row.process:
!:PSET &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#=WIN :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :SET &MAX_ITERATIONS#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.TIMER_RETRY,'INSTALL_IVANTI','1') :SET &TEMPORISATION#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.TIMER_RETRY,'INSTALL_IVANTI','2') :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'SOAP_USER','1') :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'SOAP_PASSWORD','1') :SET &MY_IVANTI_SERVER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'IVANTI_SERVER','1') :SET &MY_SOAP_LINK#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.IVANTI,'SOAP_LINK','1') :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" $i=1 $max=&MAX_ITERATIONS# $tempo=&TEMPORISATION# $my_host="&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#"
$secpasswd = ConvertTo-SecureString "&MY_PASSWORD#" -AsPlainText -Force $mycreds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ("&MY_USER#", $secpasswd) $myWS = New-WebServiceProxy -uri &MY_SOAP_LINK# -Credential $mycreds while ($i -le $max){ $Machine=$myWS.ListMachines('Computer."Device Name" LIKE &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#%')
write-host "DEBUG count " $Machine.count " Devices " $Machine.Devices.DeviceName if ($Machine.count -eq 1) { write-Host "&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# trouve" :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" break } else { write-Host "&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# non trouve" Write-Host "iteration: " $i " max": $max " tempo: " $tempo Start-Sleep -s $tempo $i++ } } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: INSTALL IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,INSTALL IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="INSTALL IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: INSTALL IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,INSTALL_IVANTI &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
